message.name: ERR_APPROVAL_REQUEST_XRV_NOT_REJECTED
message.locale: Your approval request cannot be modified. Only rejected approval requests can be modified.

message.name: ERR_APPROVAL_REQUEST_FV_REASON_EMPTY
message.locale: A rejection reason must be specified.

message.name: ERR_FV_UNIMPLEMENTED_APPROVAL_REQUEST_TYPE
message.locale: The approval request handler for approval request type entry, %1s, has not been implemented.
